item.title: About
item.description: Mental maturity does not come with age, it comes when individual realize that learning is a continuous process until they die When I first got my android device in 2009, I used it mainly for communications. However, these apps on the machine were fascinating as they helped me reduce manual efforts. This intrigued me to learn to code and understand the software works. However, I could not connect how these plain codes could run J.

item.title: Articles
item.description: Technology Content Writings Data Science Yes!!! but Statistics No?? Data Science is a hot topic trending everywhere. People become curious about how Artificial Intelligence(AI), machine learning, and computer vision work. Building applications on these technologies seems fascinating, and in many cases, people start stepping into it without knowing the depth involved. No, I am not infiltrating fear, but yes, it is no cakewalk. Marine scientists still keep discovering new findings, and so is the depth of data science.

item.title: Project I:CreditScoreAnalysis
item.description: Classified the defaulter and non defaulter (1 and 0) people with credit score dataset using end to end supervised classification machine Learning analysis. Implemnented Logistic, KNN, RandomForest, Decison Tree, Naive Bayes Techniques. Used Ensembler methods, feature engineering. techniques to enhance the accuracy and performance. The data set is from Kaggle website GitHub Link Repository

item.title: Project II: Text Classification using natural language processing
item.description: Collected labeled dataset from Annotators as either to be pro lockdowns, pro-mask-wearing or pro-vaccination. Calculated Cohenâ€™s Kappa Score and multiple classification modeling were used. (11% increase in accuracy) Feature engineering: Regular Expression, Stop Words, Stemming, Tokenization, N-gram, and Word Frequency thereby improving accuracy further by 4 percent. GitHub Link Repository

item.title: Project III: Google Cloud Platform Deployment
Project IV: Big Data Research paper in finance
Project VI: Data Mining and generate Open Neural Network Exchange Model
item.description: Implemented random classification supervised machine learning algorithm on 0.1 million rows on a random data set. Performed end to end data preprocessing steps multiple times to improve the overall accuracy of the model. Simulated on different sets of data over and over again to increase prediction accuracy. Outcomes: It is not the accuracy that is merely important. How well your model responds to a new set of data is crucial.
